meanings.definition: A flattened stem resembling and functioning as a leaf.
meanings.sent1: The cladophylla of the cactus stores water efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The tropical plant's cladophylla help it adapt to the hot climate.
meanings.sent3: The cladophylla decided to join the leaves in their photosynthesis party.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like a field of colorful cladophylla.
meanings.sent5: The unique shape of the cladophylla makes it stand out in the garden.

meanings.definition: A plant with flattened stems resembling and functioning as leaves.
meanings.sent1: The gardener admired the beauty of the exotic cladophylla in the greenhouse.
meanings.sent2: In the rainforest, you can find various species of cladophylla plants.
meanings.sent3: The cladophylla plant whispered secrets to the neighboring flowers.
meanings.sent4: The garden looked like a sea of green cladophylla waving in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The delicate cladophylla leaves danced gracefully in the sunlight.
